DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study is to compare radiographic upper airway measurements of the SimBabyTM pediatric patient high-fidelity simulator with actual human airway anatomy to assess the grade of realism of the simulator.
DOC.criteria: MRI or CT head or neck including upper airway age: 112 months no pathology of airway, face, neck no airway device in place head not in neutral position neck collar
